prompt: Create an abstract animated visualization for the Shona word "svika" meaning "arrive". Show 2 colorful geometric shapes representing the syllables: svi-ka. When showing "sv", add sparkles and flowing particles to represent the whistled sound. Use bright, educational colors on a clean background. Each syllable should pulse or glow as it's pronounced. Create smooth transitions between syllables. Style: educational animation, abstract geometric design, suitable for language learning apps.
